Overview[edit | edit source]

Main article: Pay-to-play Fishing training § Fish

The only fishing shop available in the starting region is Fernahei's Fishing Hut, which is immediately accessible due to the Shilo Village quest auto-unlock.

Fishing is heavily modified by two tier 1 relics.

  • Endless Harvest greatly increases the speed at which players can obtain raw fish.
  • Production Master is not directly beneficial to Fishing training.
  • Skilling Prodigy increases catch rates due to its +12 visible level boost.

Training[edit | edit source]

Most common fish can be caught almost anywhere in Gielinor. The following methods are highlighted for above average experience, or due to valuable food caught.

Method Requirements XP per hour at
level 99 		Area Notes
Fly fishing 20 50k All areas Requires feathers for bait and a fly fishing rod.
Drift net fishing 47
44 		60k Misthalin✓ A Merfolk trident or trident of the seas is highly recommended. Drift net fishing also trains Hunter.
Barbarian fishing 48
15
15 		66k Kandarin✓ Also trains Agility and Strength slowly.
Monkfish 62 40k Kandarin✓ Quest requirement is auto-unlocked in Kandarin.
Karambwan 65
Tai Bwo Wannai Trio 		30k Karamja✓ Requires karambwanji for bait. The karambwan fishing spot north of fairy ring code dkp will never move, which can synergize well with Endless Harvest.
Infernal eels 80
Fire cape 		28k Karamja✓ Requires ice glovesor and an oily fishing rodoror. The eels can be opened with a hammer to extract Tokkul, an onyx bolt tip, or lava scale shards.
Minnows 82 (not boostable) 56k Kandarin✓ Requires the full anglers outfit.
Dark crabs 85
Elite Wilderness diary 		40k Wilderness✓ If fishing in the Wilderness Resource Area, the dark crab fishing spot will never move.
Sacred eels 87 24k Tirannwn✓ Can be dissected with a knife to extract Zulrah's scales

Shops[edit | edit source]

Shop Location Area
Gerrant's Fishy Business Port Sarim Asgarnia✓
Harry's Fishing Shop Catherby Kandarin✓
Fishing Guild Shop Fishing Guild Kandarin✓
Lovecraft's Tackle Witchhaven Kandarin✓
Fernahei's Fishing Hut Shilo Village Karamja✓
Fishmonger Rellekka Fremennik✓
Etceteria Fish Etceteria Fremennik✓
Island Fishmonger Miscellania Fremennik✓
Flosi's Fishmongers Jatizo Fremennik✓
Arnold's Eclectic Supplies. Piscatoris Fishing Colony Kandarin✓

Other equipment[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Angler's outfit Kandarin✓ The full set, when worn, grants a 2.5% bonus Fishing experience. Obtained from the Fishing Trawler minigame.
Barbarian fishing rod Kandarin✓ Requires barbarian training. Used to catch leaping fish, and to train Agility and Strength in addition to Fishing.
Big fishing net Kandarin✓ OR Fremennik✓ Used to catch raw mackerel, raw cod, and raw bass.
Oily fishing rod Asgarnia✓ OR Fremennik✓ OR Morytania✓ Requires blamish oil. Used to catch raw lava eel and infernal eel. It is the only method to obtain extended versions of antifire potions without unlocking the Wilderness region.

Temporary boosts[edit | edit source]

Item Region Notes
Spicy stew (brown spice) Desert✓ Boosts Fishing by ±0-5. Requires manual completion of the Freeing Evil Dave subquest in Recipe for Disaster.
Fishing potion Misthalin✓ Boosts Fishing by 3. Requires 50 Herblore.
Fish pie Misthalin✓ Boosts Fishing by 3. Can be purchased in the Cooks' Guild, which requires 32 Cooking and chef's hat to enter.
Admiral pie Misthalin✓ Boosts Fishing by 5. Requires 70 Cooking. Can also be obtained from Scorpia.

Skillcape[edit | edit source]

Item Region Master Notes
Fishing Cape Kandarin✓ Master Fisher Unlimited teleports to either the Fishing Guild or Otto's Grotto.

[[Fishing]] is heavily modified by two [[Trailblazer_League#Tier_1_relics|tier 1 relics]]. * [[Endless Harvest]] greatly increases the speed at which players can obtain raw fish. * [[Production Master]] is not directly beneficial to [[Fishing]] training. * [[Skilling Prodigy]] increases catch rates due to its +12 visible level boost. ==Training== Most common [[Pay-to-play_Fishing_training#Fish|fish]] can be caught almost anywhere in [[Gielinor]].
